StringList.description: Predefined attribute values of type string list.
StringList.markdownDescription:
Predefined attribute values of type string list.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: Textual or numeric value that describes an attribute.
Value.markdownDescription:
Textual or numeric value that describes an attribute.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Update requires: No interruption

InstanceArn.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.
InstanceArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

Name.description: The name of the predefined attribute.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the predefined attribute.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Update requires: Replacement

Last modified region.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-z]{2}(-[a-z]+){1,2}(-[0-9])?
